developer: Banque Pour Le Commerce Exterieur Lao Public
description:
"OnePay Shop – POS on Mobile

Transform your smartphone into a powerful point-of-sale (POS) terminal with OnePay Shop. Designed for convenience, security, and efficiency, this app lets stores and staff accept payments through QR codes effortlessly. Whether you run a café, a boutique, or a local convenience store, OnePay Shop helps you track every transaction in real time — without the need for extra hardware.

Say goodbye to manual records and photo receipts! With instant voice notifications, detailed reports, and staff account management, OnePay Shop makes payment tracking and store operations smoother than ever.

Key Features

- Mobile POS via QR Code
Turn your phone into a convenient payment terminal — generate a QR code instantly and let your customers pay with ease.

- Multi-Staff Accounts with Permissions
Create accounts for your staff and assign permissions such as View Only, Cancel Transaction, or Refund to Customer — ensuring secure and transparent operations.

- Track Payments by Staff
Know exactly who received which payment. Every transaction is linked to the staff who presented the QR code.

- Real-Time Voice Notifications
Get instant voice alerts when a transaction is received — no more checking your screen or taking screenshots for proof.

- Easy Refund Management
Process refunds directly through the app with just a few taps.

- Export Transaction Reports
Generate and export detailed transaction lists by date — available in Excel or PDF format for easy record keeping.

Why OnePay Shop?

Because running your store should be easy, fast, and transparent. OnePay Shop is the ultimate all-in-one POS app that keeps your business organized and your customers happy — all through your mobile device."

developer: Banque Pour Le Commerce Exterieur Lao Public
description:
Experience OneBank, a suite of advanced banking services that allows you to share accounts with multiple people, control what each person can do, transfer funds to multiple recipients, issue e-cheques, and more.

BCEL One – One for All – The financial platform that everyone can bank on.
The future of mobile banking is NOW. The major updates envisage  the new security, fluid experiences, and customer centric designs. FaceScan and genuine profile photos have been added for healthier and safer banking experience. OneCare is the new and fastest channel for customers to contact the bank. OneCash, a virtual prepaid card, is your de-facto wallet or shadow account to allow you to transact socially. You can create a Cash Coupon and send it over any chat apps ; Whatsapp, Line, WeChat and Messenger… and many more, the future is NOW in the new BCEL One – One for All. Get your hands on the mobile platform that everyone can now bank on.

LDB Trust - Mobile Banking and Digital Wallet at your fingertip.
Now comes with a brand new design, easier to use than ever with more banking functionalities combining the security and reliability from LDB Trust with the ease of use and speed of LDB Wallet into a single app.

- No need to have LDB Account or Card, just register to get your Wallet
- Transfer to LDB and other banks via LAPNET with the Account number or Card number
- Bill Payment - Mobile Top-Up, Electricity bill, Water bill, Lao Social Security, Leasing, and many more
- Statement/History - Keep track of your money at any time.
Instantly block and unblock your credit card anytime for your own safety
- Bookmark - Your favorite functions right on the first page
- Scan QR Code of both the LDB Trust and LDB Wallet for Transfer, Payment, Cash out with LDB Agency
- And many more
- The ‘small-b’ function in the app is designated for Waste Payment, allowing users to efficiently handle and complete payments related to waste management.

u-money is Mobile Bank of Lao People service. u-money EU is the new financial service of Star FinTech Sole Co., Ltd.Star FinTech Sole Co., Ltd is Sub-company of Star Telecom (Unitel) that allows customers can recharge for prepaid and postpaid subscribe and sending-receiving money quickly and securely nationwide through Unitel's mobile network anytime, anywhere.
======================

======================
1. Customer services:

2. Pay Unitel’s services by u-money:

For service details, please visit website: https://unitel.com.la/u-money
The KPV gold app is created to be a channel and facilitate for customers to send gold trading orders to the company.

M moneyX is an e-wallet that offers a variety of financial services in Laos, such as money transfers, bill payments, and purchases. It is a platform serviced by Lao Mobile Money Sole Company Limited which is a subsidiary of Lao Telecom and does not require a traditional bank account. It has a simple registration system that allows users to sign up with just their mobile numbers.

Our primary goal is to assist you in making financial transactions on your smartphone from everywhere, to everyone, and at any time with the security standards, ISO 27001 certification, and PCI DSS. M moneyX customers can access financial services conveniently with bank accounts and unaccounted banks, and M moneyX will help you experience a “More Smart Life in the Digital Era”.

We intend to provide convenience in the digital world and our primary services are internal and global financial transactions, Transfers, bill payment in facility services, and other electronic payments. To become a leading Fintech company, we are also developing and integrating many functions of Telco and Fintech into one powerful application M moneyX. The customers can play a vital role in promoting the development of Lao Nation’s economy toward digital life, which is a part of building transparency, monitoring following, and modernizing.

About JDB Yes App is a mobile banking service from Joint Development Bank Limited, Say “YES” to your financial transactions on your hand from everywhere and any time plus security in place. Also make your life style easier that difference from traditional banking service’s experience.  
Services: 
 - Log on with PIN or Touch ID 
 - Balance Inquiry and History Transactions
 - Accounts Online Statements 
 - Simple access your accounts and Product including Saving, Current, Term Deposit, ATM Cards, Debit and Credit Card.
 - Customer can do online registration without walk in to the bank
 - Transfer your own money, Even friend and family 
 - Pay Your Bills 
 - Top Up Your Mobile Phone
 - Card Block and Unblock 
 - Credit Card Billing Statement & Transaction Detail
 - Credit Card Repayment  
 - Peer to Peer Money Transfer: Customer can transfer money via mobile phone number 
 - Pay Me: Customer can request to pay from your friend or family 
 - Branch and ATM Location 
 - Daily Exchange Rate, News and Promotion.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

developer: BANK FOR INVESTMENT AND DEVELOPMENT OF VIETNAM
description:
BIDV SMARTBANKING - NGÂN HÀNG SỐ CỦA TƯƠNG LAI

BIDV SmartBanking phiên bản X ra mắt với giao diện hoàn toàn mới, mang đến trải nghiệm cá nhân hóa, mượt mà trên mọi điểm chạm cùng nhiều tiện ích vượt trội dành riêng cho khách hàng cá nhân.

TRỢ LÝ AI LẦN ĐẦU XUẤT HIỆN TRÊN SMARTBANKING

    Trợ lý AI được tích hợp giúp phân tích, dự đoán, gợi ý sản phẩm phù hợp theo từng nhu cầu riêng biệt.
    Chatbot hoạt động 24/7, sẵn sàng hỗ trợ và tư vấn kịp thời mọi thắc mắc của khách hàng.

TỰ ĐỘNG ĐẦU TƯ - TỐI ƯU SINH LỜI

Tính năng đầu tư tự động lần đầu tiên ra mắt, cho phép khách hàng sử dụng hiệu quả dòng tiền nhàn rỗi bằng cách tự động gửi tiết kiệm mỗi ngày, đồng thời vẫn đảm bảo khả năng chi tiêu linh hoạt.

QUẢN LÝ TÀI CHÍNH THÔNG MINH

    Dễ dàng theo dõi thu – chi hàng tháng với báo cáo trực quan, chính xác.
    Hỗ trợ phân bổ nguồn tiền hiệu quả thông qua các công cụ lập kế hoạch tài chính cá nhân linh hoạt.

HỆ SINH THÁI TIỆN ÍCH HƠN CẢ 1 NGÂN HÀNG

    Chỉ với một ứng dụng duy nhất, khách hàng có thể: Thanh toán hóa đơn điện, nước, viễn thông, truyền hình...
    Mua sắm, đặt vé xem phim, đặt phòng khách sạn, giao hàng, giải trí,...
    Hàng trăm tiện ích tích hợp sẵn sàng đáp ứng mọi nhu cầu sống hiện đại.

AN TOÀN TUYỆT ĐỐI – BẢO MẬT TỐI ƯU

    Đăng nhập duy nhất bằng số điện thoại và một mật khẩu trên mọi thiết bị: web, điện thoại, smartwatch, bàn phím thông minh.
    Giao dịch an toàn với các phương thức xác thực: Smart OTP, sinh trắc học,...
    Cảnh báo tức thời các giao dịch có dấu hiệu gian lận, lừa đảo.

MIỄN PHÍ TOÀN DIỆN CÁC LOẠI PHÍ DỊCH VỤ

    Phí chuyển tiền trong & ngoài hệ thống
    Phí duy trì dịch vụ
    Phí quản lý tài khoản mặc định
    Phí tin nhắn OTT
    Phí phát hành & phí thường niên trọn đời thẻ phi vật lý phát hành trên SmartBanking

ĐĂNG KÝ DỄ DÀNG

    Online bằng eKYC trên ứng dụng SmartBanking
    Tại các điểm giao dịch BIDV trên toàn quốc

Thông tin chi tiết:

    Website: https://www.bidv.com.vn
    Trụ sở chính: Tháp BIDV, 194 Trần Quang Khải, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội
    Tổng đài CSKH 24/7: 1900 9247

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Our IB Cool application is loaded with features to help you get on with what is important to you, now. It will surely play an important part in your life by helping you manage your finances and paying your bills to get amazing discounts from our numerous merchants and partners.

developer: Banque Pour Le Commerce Exterieur Lao Public
description:
OneBank Kid is designed for parents who want to introduce their children to the world of finance in a safe and accessible way, offering an easy-to-use banking solution. Parents can conveniently create and assign accounts to their children or family members through the OneBank Kid app. This process is streamlined, user-friendly that ensuring a secure and educational financial journey for the next generation.

Key Features:
- Easy registration with simple steps.
- Features and functions are organized in a simple and easy-to-use manner, making them suitable and secure for kids and users of the lite version.
- Transfer money.
- Scan OnePay and LaoQR to make payments.
- Withdraw cash from BCEL ATM.
- View Card information.
- Lock/Unlock card for security.
- Topup phone balance.
- View transaction history.
- Customizable theme.

developer: Banque Pour Le Commerce Exterieur Lao Public
description:
BCEL i-Bank is the Internet Banking Service by BANQUE POUR LE COMMERCE EXTERIEUR LAO PUBLIC (BCEL) allowing customers to access their bank accounts and manage their money online from different locations 24/7.

+ Benefits

- Support your transactions faster, more convenient and reliable with various functions, including bill & tax payments, funds transfer to ID cardholders, BCEL and other domestic and international banks.
- Being able to monitor Cheque usage and bank statements.
- Transactions will be made securely and professionally through BCELi-Bank and whenever they are completed, e-receipt can be retrieved and shared for confirmation. 

+ Features	
- Payroll transactions can be managed by yourself.
- Various online transactions are provided, including funds transfer to ID cardholders, BCEL and other domestic and international banks.
- Customers can set or cancel either any preferred date or year transaction to transfer money in advance.
​- Can check your transaction history after paying bills including tax, electricity, water supply, telecom services (home/mobile phones, Internet, buy prepaid card), LDTV membership, etc.
- Check transaction details including savings and current accounts, fixed-term deposits and loan accounts.
- Can print out or send your bank statements to email weekly or monthly.
- Monitor cheque usage and status.
- Access daily exchange rates from BCEL.
- Raise security level by allowing to add the number of users to access as well as OTP Token and prioritize the rights to access BCEL i-Bank.
- ​Corporations should be allowed to have many users to access BCEL i-Bank and raise security level by determining the rights of users to approve and check each transaction. OTP will be used to confirm your transactions, which are monitored through Audit Log that users can access any time.

+ Terms of Services	
- Must have savings and current account with BCEL.
- Only an account holder or a person, who has been entitled by an account holder, can register for the service
- Before using the services, you should accept terms and conditions and also complete the application form with reliable information
- A power of attorney letter is required, if an account holder cannot register/apply by himself/herself while valid ID cards must be provided by both an account holder and his/her representative

+ Application Form	
You can register for BCEL iBank at Head Office or any branch nearby you or download the application form via BCEL website (https://www.bcel.com.la)

Tel: (856-21) 264959, Hotline:1555, Email: e-banking@bcel.com.la

LVB DigiBank is the digital banking of Lao - Viet Joint Venture Bank Co., Ltd

(1) LVB DigiBank is the digital banking of Lao-Viet Joint Venture Bank Co., Ltd to satisfy the demands on banking services of individual, business and other organisations.
(2) TOTALLY FREE registration, maintenance, management and use. Many banking services on LVB DigiBank are free including domestic transfer, bill payment and many others. Customers also receive Cash Back or discount for phone top-up, bill payment, payments by QR-Pay.
3) Customer needs only 1 user and password to do banking transactions on any Internet-connected devices such as mobile phones, tablets, desktops, laptops.

Best Features of LVB DigiBank:
(1) Convenient financial management with a function allowing users to access information and history of all accounts including current accounts, saving accounts, term deposit, loans, card…
(2) Instant and secure international and domestic money transfer: internal transfer within the system of LVB, domestic interbank transfer, international transfer, transfer via phone number, quick transfer 24/7.
(3) Water bill payment, telecom fee payment, ADSL, Leased line, road charge payment, land tax payment, national budget payment, Phone top-up.
(4) Payment for loan of financial companies and microfinance organisations.
(5) Bying Insurances: new insurance premium and renewal of existing insurance contracts.
(6) Scheduled automatic payment for bills; favourite payments
(7) Employee salary payment, payroll
(8) Payment with QR Code.
(9) Foreign exchange
(10) Online term deposit: New creation deposit, term deposit closure.
(11) Card services: access card information, activate/lock card, check card transaction history
(12) Register for services: register for card issuance, register for loan online, and others.

Utilities:
1. Login by fingerprint, face
2. Verify transaction by SmartOTP
3. Set up favourite functions on Homepage
4. Set up profile picture, background picture, change background colour 
5. Check exchange rate, interest rate, branch/AMT location
6. Interest rate platform, exchange rate platform
7. Receive information from LVB
8. Language options: Lao, English, Vietnamese
9. Shareable application
10. Beneficiary names and payment accounts can be defaulted.

As part of a global trend banking is moving to digital platforms. 
Phongsavanh Bank is also moving this way to provide more choices in digital banking products and services for its customers. 
We have mobile and online payment solutions with QR code via Wallet and Internet Banking for individuals, corporate, merchants and agents.  
With our digital platforms called “Hi App, Hi Agent and Hi Business”, customers can do anywhere and 24/7 banking activities such as internal account transfers, interbank transfers, bill payments, scheduled payments, salary payments. 
Customers can also open new accounts, pay or apply for loans, request statements, top up mobile, cash in, cash out, foreign exchange, and search for branch/service unit/ATM locations.      
Customers can use our high security application via Desktop, Tablet and Mobile platform. 
It will take only a few minutes for customers to apply for new products and services by downloading the app from App Store.
We work to build your trust at Phongsavanh Bank.

developer: UNION LAO Non Deposit Taking Microfinance Institution Co., LTD
description:
คุณสามารถดาวน์โหลด U life เพื่อแก้ปัญหาความต้องการทางการเงินเร่งด่วนสำหรับพนักงานกินเงินเดือน เกษตรกร และลูกค้าท่านอื่นๆ ได้! ยูไลฟ์ พัฒนาโดย UnionLao
มีบริการต่างๆ ดังต่อไปนี้:
สินเชื่อมีหลักประกัน/สินเชื่อไม่มีหลักประกัน
อนุมัติรวดเร็ว: อนุมัติโดยปัญญาประดิษฐ์ กรอกใบสมัครเสร็จภายใน 10 นาที ใช้บัตรประชาชนหรือบัตรสำมะโนเพื่อขอสินเชื่อ ไม่ต้องใช้เอกสารที่ยุ่งยาก
จำนวนเงินกู้สูงและอัตราดอกเบี้ยต่ำ: อัตราดอกเบี้ยต่ำสุดคือ 0.05%/วัน (1.5% ต่อเดือน) จำกัดตั้งแต่ 5 ล้านกีบ ถึง 50 ล้านกีบ เลือกจำนวนเงินกู้ที่เหมาะสม ไม่มีค่าธรรมเนียม การจัดเก็บโปร่งใส
ผ่อนชำระแบบยืดหยุ่น: รองรับการผ่อนชำระ 3-12 งวด ไม่มีค่าปรับสำหรับการผ่อนชำระก่อนกำหนด หักเงินอัตโนมัติเพื่อหลีกเลี่ยงการชำระล่าช้า
การรับประกันความปลอดภัย: เทคโนโลยีการเข้ารหัสระดับธนาคารเพื่อปกป้องความเป็นส่วนตัวของผู้ใช้
วิธีการใช้งาน? 3 ขั้นตอนง่ายๆในการขอสินเชื่อ
การลงทะเบียนและเข้าสู่ระบบ: การยืนยันหมายเลขโทรศัพท์ การอัพโหลดบัตรประจำตัวประชาชนหรือสูติบัตรใช้เวลาเพียง 1 นาที
ยื่นคำร้องขอ: กรอกจำนวนเงินกู้และระยะเวลาการชำระคืน ระบบจะประเมินจำนวนเงินกู้ให้อัตโนมัติ
รับเงินอย่างรวดเร็ว: หลังจากผ่านขั้นตอนการตรวจสอบสำเร็จ เงินจะถูกโอนไปยังบัญชีธนาคารของคุณโดยตรง และคุณจะได้รับเงินในบัญชีของคุณภายใน 5 นาที
เหตุใดจึงควรเลือกเรา?

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

TrueMoney is Thailand’s leading financial application for all mobile network users (AIS, Dtac, TrueMove H). Our all-in-one app lets you securely make cashless and cardless payments for all your everyday needs, including mobile top-ups, bill payments, online and offline purchases, and much more! Enrich your daily life, and enjoy exclusive promotions and discounts across a wide variety of merchants and services. Simplify your finances for more possibilities with a high yield saving account with cashback after spending, insurances, and investment in various assets. We also empower businesses of all sizes and help SME entrepreneurs to grow their business.


Instant phone top-up
> Top-up your TrueMove H prepaid phone numbers easily anytime, anywhere.
> Get exclusive promotions and data packages only in the app.
> Enjoy privileges with TrueID TV, TrueYou, TruePoints and many more partners.


Protect all your transactions with TrueMoney Secure
Pay with confidence knowing that your information is fully encrypted, secured, and protected. Pay with your wallet balance, or link a credit / debit card and shop at offline stores, or pay bills. Pay online with confidence as you can control payment within the amount that you top-up. No need to share your credit card or bank account numbers to others. TrueMoney also verifies to make sure that you are the one who makes transactions with face verified technology. Multiple layers of advanced security, including 24/7 real-time monitoring and world-class data encryption technology, keeps your money and data safe, and your transactions 100% secure.


Shop at 7-Eleven and other stores without cash and pay in abroad
> Pay hassle-free at 7-Eleven, Makro, True Coffee, and thousands of other merchants without cash. Earn TruePoints and other rewards. Enjoy special promotions from our merchant partners, with new promotions added every day.
> Pay in abroad at over 40 destinations. No need to exchange cash. Just open TrueMoney to pay.


Send & receive money with ease
Securely and instantly transfer money without fees between TrueMoney and enjoy convenient features such as gift envelopes, link to pay, and reminder to return money.


Easy top-up
> Link a bank account for quick and secure top-ups (all major banks supported).
> Top up via internet banking, 7-Eleven stores, Boonterm top-up machines, ATM, TrueMoney kiosks, and more.


Note: Apple is not a sponsor, and is not, in any part, related to the promotional activity within this application.

K PLUS ผู้นำด้านดิจิตอล แบงก์กิ้ง จากธนาคารกสิกรไทย แพลตฟอร์มที่ให้มากกว่าบริการทางการเงิน สำหรับออนไลน์ไลฟ์สไตล์ ใช้ง่าย ปลอดภัย พร้อมให้บริการสำหรับผู้ใช้อายุ 12 ปีขึ้นไป สามารถเปิด K-eSavings ผ่านแอปได้ด้วยตัวเอง หรือเข้าใช้งาน K PLUS Lobby ได้แม้ไม่มีบัญชีหรือบัตรธนาคารกสิกรไทย	
		
ง่ายทุกธุรกรรม
- โอนผ่านเบอร์มือถือ พร้อมเพย์หรือ สแกน QR
- จ่ายบิล ตั้งชำระล่วงหน้า หรือตั้งเตือนก็ได้
- เติมเงินได้ทุกที่
- ธุรกรรมรวดเร็วจบจากหน้าแรก แค่ตั้งรายการโปรด
- ถอนเงินไม่ใช้บัตรผ่านตู้ K-ATM หรือ เคแบงก์เซอร์วิสใกล้คุณ
- ดูสรุปภาพรวมบัญชี รู้ทันทุกรายรับ รายจ่าย
- รับ Statement ผ่านทางอีเมลล์ ย้อนหลังสูงสุด 12 เดือน 

จัดการบัตรเครดิตกสิกรไทย และสินเชื่อง่ายๆด้วยตัวเอง
- เปลี่ยนวงเงินบัตรกสิกรไทยเป็นเงินสดเข้าบัญชี ผ่านบริการ K-Smart Cash แบ่งชำระสูงสุด 10 เดือน
- เลือกแบ่งชำระรายการใช้จ่ายบัตรกสิกรไทยแบบรายเดือนผ่านบริการ K-Smart Pay
- ล็อคและปลดล็อคบัตรเครดิตได้เองยามฉุกเฉิน
- สมัครสินเชื่อเงินด่วน Xpress Loan และบัตรเงินด่วน Xpress Cash รู้ผลเร็วกว่า

มั่นใจทุกการลงทุน
- เปิดบัญชีซื้อ-ขายกองทุน พร้อมดูรายการเคลื่อนไหว
- ดูสรุปภาพรวมสินทรัพย์ในหน้าเดียว
- ลงทุนให้ถึงเป้าหมายด้วย Wealth PLUS ที่พร้อมช่วยเริ่มต้นวางแผนและดูแลปรับเปลี่ยนพอร์ทตลอดระยะเวลาลงทุน

K Point พ้อยท์พันธ์ใหม่ ใช้เติมเงิน จ่ายบิล ช้อปปิ้งแทนเงินสด
- สะสมได้ง่ายๆ แม้ไม่มีบัตรกสิกรไทยผ่านการร่วมภารกิจบน K PLUS 
- จ่ายบิล/เติมเงิน แลกของรางวัล หรือแลกเครดิตเงินคืน
- ช้อปปิ้งสินค้าและดีลหลากหลายบน K+ market
- โอน K Point ไปเป็นคะแนนสะสม The 1, AIS Points, Blue Point หรือ TruePoint 

เชื่อมต่อหลากแพลตฟอร์ม
- บริการครบวงจร สะดวกทุกที่ ยืนยันตัวตน ฝาก-ถอน ได้ที่ร้านค้าพันธมิตรเคแบงก์เซอร์วิสทั่วประเทศ
- เพิ่มบัตรสมาชิกแบรนด์ชั้นนำ พร้อมตรวจสอบคะแนนได้ทุกที่
เติม จ่าย สะดวกครบ ไม่ต้องกรอกเลข เพียงเลือกจ่ายด้วย K PLUS


K PLUS – the leading digital banking from KASIKORNBANK. The platform that offers variety services to enhance your online lifestyle. Ready to use for all users age 12 and above. Open K-savings by yourself on the application or simply join K PLUS Lobby, no need to be a KBank account or card holders.

Make your daily banking transactions easy.
- Faster transfer via mobile number, Prompt Pay, or scan QR code.
- Pay your bills conveniently. Schedule payments in advance or create payment reminders.
- Top up your daily use services on the go.
- Make faster transactions from home page, just set up your favorite list.
- Cardless cash withdrawal from K-ATM or KBank Service nearby
- Display income and expenses summaries of all your accounts.
- Request your statement up to previous 12 months and receive it instantly in your mailbox.

Conveniently manage your KBank Credit Cards and Loans.
- Transfer your KBank Credit Card limit to your deposit account via KBank Smart Cash service. Repay in installments of up to 10 months.
- Turn any unbilled KBank Credit Card or Xpress Cash spending into monthly installments via K-Smart Pay service.
- Instantly block and unblock your credit card anytime. for your own safety.
- Apply for Xpress Loan and Xpress Cash on K PLUS. Get faster results.

Secure your investments.
- Open an account, purchase mutual funds, and monitor portfolio movements.
- See the overview of your assets in one stop.
- Optimize your investment towards selected goals with Wealth PLUS. Help building your plan and automatically manage your portfolio.

K Point—the new reward points—redeemable for top up, bill payments, or shopping.
- Enjoy fun missions on K PLUS to collect your points. No need to be a credit card holder.
- Make bill payments, top ups, or simply get cash rebates.
- Redeem your favorite items and deals on K+ market.
- Transfer K Point to partnered membership program—The 1, AIS Points, Blue Point or TruePoint

Connected across platforms, enhance every lifestyles.
- Conveniently verify your identity, make deposits or withdraw money from KBank Service partners.
- Add member cards and check your points on the go.
- Seamlessly top up or pay bills just select K PLUS as your payment option.

About Easy App: The first banking application in Thailand offering more than just an ordinary transaction. Over 12 million people manage their finances through the app. You can do basic financial activities like transfer money to friends and family, pay your bills, top-up your mobile phones. The new app also offers these useful features: 
• Customize your home screen: for optimal usage, customize your home screen display with frequent transactions fitting your needs
• Cardless ATM: clicks away from cash withdrawals with the new Cardless ATM menu 
• Lifestyle ready: a contemporary lifestyle menu includes restaurant recommendations, movie ticket, and Easy Bonus, a new rewards program offering privileges all-year-round
• Fingerprint recognition: access the service with the touch of your finger with the fingerprint recognition log-in option 
• Adjustable daily transfer limit: flexible option to raise your daily transfer limit to a higher amount and vice versa
